price: Hamd olsun Allah'a ki, kuluna kitabı indirdi ve onda hiçbir eğrilik koymadı.
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عِوَجَاۜ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī anzala ʿalā ʿabdihi al-kitāba walam yajʿal lahu ʿiwajā
